name: border-resample
author: Washington University School of Medicin
description:
RESAMPLE A BORDER FILE TO A DIFFERENT MESH.

Resamples a border file, given two spherical surfaces that are in register.  Only borders that have the same structure as current-sphere will be resampled.

inputs.name: current_sphere
inputs.description: a sphere surface with the mesh that the metric is currently on

inputs.name: new_sphere
inputs.description: a sphere surface that is in register with <current-sphere> and has the desired output mesh
